title: Project Yi's in game voice is at a whisper in volume
body: You should fix this considering the skin cost me an arm and a leg...

replies.body:
Gonna copy pasta from the original post below - 

We're in the process of seeing what we can do to raise the volume. Since it's a legendary skin, there's a bit more to it than just moving a slider. We're hoping to have this completed soon, but it's certainly on our radar!

This issue was asked earlier (from me) and a rioter commented on it. The link to it is right below.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/jxXKcu3M-vo-problem-with-project-yi-maybe-bug
